examples: Too much cutting dulls the knife's edge

definitions.text: make less lively, intense, or vigorous; impair in vigor, force, activity, or sensation
having a broad or rounded end
examples: thick marks made by a blunt pencil

definitions.text: used of a knife or other blade; not sharp
characterized by directness in manner or speech; without subtlety or evasion
examples: I gave them my candid opinion
a forthright approach to the problem
tell me what you think--and you may just as well be frank
it is possible to be outspoken without being rude

definitions.text: devoid of any qualifications or disguise or adornment
examples: facing the stark reality of the deadline
